articles.title: N Chandrasekaran enjoys chai from Tata Tea kiosk at Davos 2023 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: World Economic Forum, Davos 2023: Special chefs have been arranged for platters being served with most of the food ingredients being sourced directly from India. Tata Tea has been curating a special range of teas called Tata Tea 1868 at the World Economic For…
articles.content:
Tata Sons chief N Chandrasekaran was seen enjoying a cup of hot tea at the ongoing World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, where the temperature drops below zero in winter.
